mapper.select: SELECT stockWarn.`id` AS id, stockWarn.`item_id` AS itemId, stockWarn.`kitchen_id` AS kitchenId, stockWarn.`content` AS content, stockWarn.`state` AS state, stockWarn.`time` As time, stockItem.`name` AS itemName FROM `t_stock_warn` stockWarn INNER JOIN `t_stock_item` stockItem ON stockItem.id = stockWarn.item_id WHERE kitchen_id = #{kitchenId} AND state = 0
